definition.text: Make sure Parameters are in place!

paragraphs.text: Before runnin the backtest, make sure that the Trading Parameters node has consistent data. I already prepared everything for you, but take some time and notice that:
Session Base Asset is set to 0
Session Quoted Asset is set to 1000 (That is 1000$USDT in this case)
Slippage is set to 0 because I'm backtesting small amounts and I can assume orders are filled with no slippage
Are you ready? Run the backtest!
